sentences.en: A gold recovery and concentrate quality are closely related to economic efficiency in a floatation plant.
sentences.cn: 在浮选厂,金浮选回收率及精矿质量与经济效益密切相关.

sentences.en: Floatation column is a high efficiency separation equipment recovering valuable mineral fines.
sentences.cn: 浮选柱是回收细颗粒有价矿物的高效分选设备.

sentences.en: It has actuality significance to level off classification and floatation procedure, to advance separation indicator.
sentences.cn: 补偿工艺对于稳定分级作业和选别流程 、 提高选别指标具有重要意义.

sentences.en: It � � s proved that high grade carbonaceous gold concentrate can be obtained by floatation.
sentences.cn: 研究表明,浮选可获得品位较高的含碳质金精矿.

sentences.en: Property and slurry character of floatation tailings in Linhuan were analyzed.
sentences.cn: 分析了临涣选煤厂浮选尾煤的性质及成浆性.

sentences.en: Super - fluidics floatation is high efficient compared with commons.
sentences.cn: 超效 射流气浮技术同传统的气浮方法相比,更显得高效实用.

sentences.en: The bubble generator is the key equipment of microbubble floatation.
sentences.cn: 气泡发生器是微泡浮选的关键.

sentences.en: The effect of graphite floatation on mechanical property of nodular graphite cast iron was studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了石墨漂浮对球铁机械性能的影响规律.

sentences.en: The floatation performance of jamesonite with diethyldithiocarbamate as collector is studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了以乙硫氮为捕收剂时脆硫锑铅矿的浮选性质.

sentences.en: The floatation process for the mixed primary ore is investigated.
sentences.cn: 研究混合原生锰矿的浮选工艺.

sentences.en: The increase of carbon equivalent is primary reason for graphite floatation.
sentences.cn: 碳当量高是引起石墨漂浮的主要原因.

sentences.en: The structure, the principle of work, bauxite floatation of BF - L floatation machine were presented.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍了BF -L 型浮选机的结构特点, 工作原理及铝土矿选矿的适应性研究.

sentences.en: The water sports centre will provide you with snorkelling gear and a floatation vest if you would like one.
sentences.cn: 在水上运动中心将为你提供的浮浅齿轮和浮选背心，如果你想的话。

sentences.en: Then, a floatation washing machine is placed in between to remove rocks and trash.
sentences.cn: 然后, 由期间安置的洗选机除去碎石、碎物等.

sentences.en: This paper recommends the general technics and application of the fluidic air - floatation system.
sentences.cn: 作者介绍了射流溶气浮选系统的工艺概况及其应用情况.

sentences.en: This thesis presents and implements a kind of floatation controlling technology based on image recognition.
sentences.cn: 本文提出并实现了一种基于图像识别的浮选测控方式,主要工作有以下几方面.

words.tran_cn: 彩车，花车；漂流物；浮舟；浮萍
